short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: THIS EXTENSION IS FOR BETA TESTING. Save blogs from public website's to your Indago collections.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Functionality of the extension is to allow users to authenticate, research, select  and save web content from public websites to their Indago collections.
